Keywords: Maximum Carnage , Monster , Scientist
Real Name: Malcolm McBride
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering
MAXIMUM CARNAGE: Once per turn when Carrion hits, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to up to 2 opposing characters that weren't hit but are adjacent to a hit character.
DRAIN YOU UNTIL YOU'RE DRY: When an adjacent opposing character begins a move, after resolutions you may place Carrion adjacent to that character.
ROTTING TOUCH: Poison. When Carrion uses it and damages an opposing character, after resolutions he deals 1 penetrating damage to each adjacent opposing character.

Comments
September 24, 2020
ArkhamInquirer
I love this Carrion. He's much more spartan than the old one, and flat out better to boot. You want to either park this guy in a swarm of cheap pieces, or have him latch onto your opponent's best piece; he's either going to be poisoning crowds to death, or he's going to be smacking someone for 3 penetrating damage turn after turn when they just flat out cannot get away. Honestly, this Carrion reminds me a lot of how he functioned in the Maximum Carnage video game; he's annoying, constantly coming towards you, and if you let him latch onto you, you're gonna be sorry.
September 11, 2020
